Introduction
============

Plone Ads

This is a product where u can insert commercial ads into your plone site,
including a portlet to show the ads.


Feedback
--------

Please send any changes, improvements, or suggestions regarding this Plone
product to "Four Digits":mailto:info@fourdigits.nl

Requirements
------------

Plone Ads is tested on Plone 3.1 and 3.2, please submit any compatibility issues
you may encounter.
